publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2503 Mr Andy Kerr: Scottish Public Sector Ombudsman Bill: Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Scottish Public Sector Ombudsman Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock*
